external_games.name: Garfield: Attack of the Mutant Lasagna
Garfield: Attack of the Mutant Lasagna

name: Garfield: Attack of the Mutant Lasagna
summary: Garfield: Attack of the Mutant Lasagna is a fan-made point and click adventure based on the comic strip character Garfield. In it, a radioactive spill mixing in with the ingredients of lasagna cause an incident of mutant lasagna running amuck, and its' up to Garfield to stop them with all the verbs of a point and click protagonist.
